message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. It's something that I've personally valued at no less than $1000000, but I'm willing to negotiate a price that would be mutually beneficial.  I'm confident this product will be worth at least $1200000 to you, making this a potentially very lucrative investment.  Let's discuss a price that works for both of us.
